@jennybacolina 
1. Download and install a torrent client (if you haven't got one already installed)
2. Click on Get This Torrent
3. A window will open up with a lots of things in it. Ignore
4. On the top of that window it is asking you where do you want to download to. Select the location
5. Press OK
6. torrent client will start up. Be patient and ownload

Once you finished the downloading please keep uploading till you uploaded twice as much then downloaded!!!
